titleStmt.title: A sermon preached in the Cathedrall Church in Norwich, the xxi. day of December, 1589. by W. Burton, minister of the word of God there. And published for the satisfying of some which took offence thereat
titleStmt.author: Burton, William, d. 1616.

notesStmt.note: Printer's name and publication date from STC.

Probably printed after 1591 since Burton called his Certaine questions (1591) his "first fruites" (cf. DNB, 2nd. ed., III, p. 470); British Museum, however, dates their copy 1590(?).--Folger Shakespeare Library Catalog.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
